Question: The Oxford Classical Texts offers the current standard complete Greek text of this person's complete works.
Hints: Many papyri which contain fragments of this person's texts are among the Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
According to another biographer of him, Neanthes, this person was eighty-four years of age at his death.
An overview of this person's writings according to this system can be found in the Stephanus pagination article.
